name: Cajun nuts
tagline: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Vel dolores, ipsa saepe iste, officiis perferendis repellendus
description: Cajun Nuts spiced up with a spice mixture including paprika, cayenne pepper, white pepper, onion powder, oregano, and thyme. They are coated in bacon grease and garlic and roasted in a 200 degree oven to help meld the flavors to the nuts.

name: Azeitão cheese
tagline: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Vel dolores, ipsa saepe iste, officiis perferendis repellendus
description: Azeitão is a cured cheese, of a buttery, pudding-like, semi-soft consistency, white or light yellow in colour, with few or no holes. Since the flower of the locally grown cardoon plant acts as a coagulant, it is truly a vegetarian cheese. Its taste has a mix of sour and salty with a continual herbaceousness.

name: Wild Heat Beef Jerky
tagline: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Vel dolores, ipsa saepe iste, officiis perferendis repellendus
description: Wild Heat Beef Jerky takes spicy meat snacks to a whole new level. It packs more than just heat. The complex flavor combination of spices will take your taste buds to a new depth of savory and spicy – leaving you with a serious kick that hurts so good you’ll be coming back for more!

name: Gorgonzola Dolce
tagline: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Vel dolores, ipsa saepe iste, officiis perferendis repellendus
description: Gorgonzola Dolce 'The Sweet One' in Italy this is sometimes known as Cremifacato or Dolcelatte. Traditionally made from cows milk, it has a wonderful flavor that is mild, creamy and sweet. This is a younger version of an aged Gorgonzola and is most loved for the soft, spreadable texture.

description: Dulce de Leche, bananas and meringue are a delicious and rich combination, but the lime zest adds a citrous bite and makes it irresistible!

name: Caramel toffee cake

description: If you're looking for decadent caramel dessert, this Caramel Apple Toffee Cake is it. An irresistable homemade spiced sheet cake smothered with layer of sweet apples and toffee bits, with caramel sauce drizzled all over it. But wait, we're still not done... top it fluffy whipped cream, even more caramel and more toffee and you are in cake heaven!
